General.Name: Pluribus Technologies Corp
General.Description: Pluribus Technologies Corp. is a principal investment firm. The firm seeks to invest in software, financial Services, healthcare, public sector, retail, energy sector companies. The firm seeks to focus on companies with less than $5 million in revenue that have 20-30% normalized EBITDA. Pluribus Technologies Corp. founded in 2017 and based in Toronto, Canada with additional offices in Raleigh, North Carolina and Irvine, California.
General.Address: 111 Peter St., Toronto, ON, Canada, M5V 2H1
